long_description: Designed to be the most uncompromising, high-performance riding jacket available, the Patagonia Powslayer shell is built with Gore-Tex(R) Pro fabric for durable waterproof, breathable protection. Durable and lightweight 3-layer Gore-Tex Pro shell fabric offers excellent, long-lasting waterproof, breathable protection from winter's worst. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Low-profile powder skirt is designed to move with you; webbing loop connects skirt to compatible ski or snowboard pants to keep snow out (pants sold separately). Helmet-compatible, 2-way-adjustable hood with laminated visor optimizes visibility in bad conditions. Drop-in cargo pockets; zip handwarmer pockets; chest pocket with media cable routing; zip pass pocket on arm; internal stash pocket. Coated external zippers are watertight and designed to reduce bulk and weight. Underarm zips on the Patagonia Powslayer shell jacket allow venting so you won't overheat.
